languages.text: "И одного твоего появления в Просторе вновь было достаточно, чтобы схизма вновь подняла голову. Флот Осознание уже раздирает братоубийственная война! Этого мы хотели? Давай закончим это... Прервем Цикл!" {n}Теперь слова той, что называла себя Медным шепотом, больше похожи на мольбу.{/n}

"And it sufficed for you to merely show up in the Expanse again for the schism to rear its head once more. The Cognisance Fleet is already being torn apart by a fratricidal war! Is this what we wanted? Let us finish this... Let us discontinue the Cycle!" {n}Now the words of the one who once called herself Brasswhisper sound more like a plea.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И одного твоего появления в Просторе вновь было достаточно, чтобы схизма вновь подняла голову. Флот Осознание уже раздирает братоубийственная война! Этого мы хотели? Давай закончим это... Прервем Цикл!" {n}Теперь слова той, что называла себя Медным шепотом, больше похожи на мольбу.{/n}

Is this what we wanted? Let us finish this... Let us discontinue the Cycle!" {n}Now the words of the one who used to call herself Brasswhisper sound more like a plea.{/n}

Is this what we wanted? Let us finish this... Let us discontinue the Cycle!" {n}Now the words of the one who once called herself Brasswhisper sound more like a plea.{/n}

languages.text: 「またエクスパンスで、トップを育て直す分派が姿を見せたらあなたは満足だった。コグニサンス艦隊は兄弟争いですでに分裂しつつある！これが私たちの望みだったのか？こんなことは終わらせよう…円環を止めよう！」{n}かつてブラスウィスパーを名乗っていた者の言葉は、懇願の度合いを増している。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And it sufficed for you to merely show up in the Expanse again for the schism to rear its head once more. The Cognisance Fleet is already being torn apart by a fratricidal war! Is this what we wanted? Let us finish this... Let us discontinue the Cycle!" {n}Now the words of the one who once called herself Brasswhisper sound more like a plea.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「またエクスパンスで、トップを育て直す分派が姿を見せたらあなたは満足だった。コグニサンス艦隊は兄弟争いですでに分裂しつつある！これが私たちの望みだったのか？こんなことは終わらせよう…円環を止めよう！」{n}かつてブラスウィスパーを名乗っていた者の言葉は、懇願の度合いを増している。{/n}

languages.text: “你光是再次出现在科罗努斯扩区，这件事情就足以再度引发分裂了。真理开拓者舰队已经被自相残杀的内部战争撕裂了！这是我们想要的吗？让我们结束这一切吧……让我们来终止循环吧！”{n}此刻，这个曾自称为铜语的人近乎恳求地说道。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And it sufficed for you to merely show up in the Expanse again for the schism to rear its head once more. The Cognisance Fleet is already being torn apart by a fratricidal war! Is this what we wanted? Let us finish this... Let us discontinue the Cycle!" {n}Now the words of the one who once called herself Brasswhisper sound more like a plea.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你光是再次出现在科罗努斯扩区，这件事情就足以再度引发分裂了。真理开拓者舰队已经被自相残杀的内部战争撕裂了！这是我们想要的吗？让我们结束这一切吧……让我们来终止循环吧！”{n}此刻，这个曾自称为铜语的人近乎恳求地说道。{/n}

languages.text: « Il aura suffi que vous débarquiez de nouveau dans les Étendues pour que le schisme pointe de nouveau le bout de son nez. La preuve, la Flotte de la Connaissance est déjà le théâtre d'une guerre fratricide ! Est-ce là ce que nous voulions ? Finissons-en... Nous devons interrompre le Cycle ! » {n}Le ton de celle qui se faisait appeler Murmecuivre se fait de plus en plus implorant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And it sufficed for you to merely show up in the Expanse again for the schism to rear its head once more. The Cognisance Fleet is already being torn apart by a fratricidal war! Is this what we wanted? Let us finish this... Let us discontinue the Cycle!" {n}Now the words of the one who once called herself Brasswhisper sound more like a plea.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il aura suffi que vous débarquiez de nouveau dans les Étendues pour que le schisme pointe de nouveau le bout de son nez. La preuve, la Flotte de la Connaissance est déjà le théâtre d'une guerre fratricide ! Est-ce là ce que nous voulions ? Finissons-en... Nous devons interrompre le Cycle ! » {n}Le ton de celle qui se faisait appeler Murmecuivre se fait de plus en plus implorant.{/n}

languages.text: «Y fue suficiente que volvieras a aparecer en la Extensión para que la división se volviese a producir. ¡La Flota Conciencia ya estaba sufriendo por una guerra fratricida! ¿Seguro que era eso lo que queríamos? Acabemos con esto... ¡Interrumpamos el Ciclo!». {n}Ahora las palabras de la que se hacía llamar Susurro de latón suenan más como una súplica.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And it sufficed for you to merely show up in the Expanse again for the schism to rear its head once more. The Cognisance Fleet is already being torn apart by a fratricidal war! Is this what we wanted? Let us finish this... Let us discontinue the Cycle!" {n}Now the words of the one who once called herself Brasswhisper sound more like a plea.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y fue suficiente que volvieras a aparecer en la Extensión para que la división se volviese a producir. ¡La Flota Conciencia ya estaba sufriendo por una guerra fratricida! ¿Seguro que era eso lo que queríamos? Acabemos con esto... ¡Interrumpamos el Ciclo!». {n}Ahora las palabras de la que se hacía llamar Susurro de latón suenan más como una súplica.{/n}

languages.text: "Und allein, dass Ihr wieder in der Ausdehnung erschienen seid, war schon genug, damit die Spaltung ihre hässliche Fratze wieder zeigt. Die Erkenntnisflotte wird bereits durch einen Bruderkrieg auseinandergerissen! Ist das etwa, was wir wollten? Lasst uns das zu Ende bringen ... Lasst uns den Zyklus unterbrechen!" {n}Nun klingen die Worte die sich einst Messingflüsterer genannt hat, mehr wie ein Flehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And it sufficed for you to merely show up in the Expanse again for the schism to rear its head once more. The Cognisance Fleet is already being torn apart by a fratricidal war! Is this what we wanted? Let us finish this... Let us discontinue the Cycle!" {n}Now the words of the one who once called herself Brasswhisper sound more like a plea.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und allein, dass Ihr wieder in der Ausdehnung erschienen seid, war schon genug, damit die Spaltung ihre hässliche Fratze wieder zeigt. Die Erkenntnisflotte wird bereits durch einen Bruderkrieg auseinandergerissen! Ist das etwa, was wir wollten? Lasst uns das zu Ende bringen ... Lasst uns den Zyklus unterbrechen!" {n}Nun klingen die Worte die sich einst Messingflüsterer genannt hat, mehr wie ein Flehen.{/n}

languages.text: "Ve bölünmenin yeniden baş göstermesi için Enginlik'te ortaya çıkman yeterli oldu. Malumat Filosu şimdiden kardeşin kardeşi katlettiği bir savaşla parçalandı bile! İstediğimiz şey bu muydu? Bu işi bitirelim. Döngü'nün süreğini bozalım!" {n}Pirinçfısıltı ismini kullanan şahsın sözleri giderek bir yalvarışa benzemeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And it sufficed for you to merely show up in the Expanse again for the schism to rear its head once more. The Cognisance Fleet is already being torn apart by a fratricidal war! Is this what we wanted? Let us finish this... Let us discontinue the Cycle!" {n}Now the words of the one who once called herself Brasswhisper sound more like a plea.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ve bölünmenin yeniden baş göstermesi için Enginlik'te ortaya çıkman yeterli oldu. Malumat Filosu şimdiden kardeşin kardeşi katlettiği bir savaşla parçalandı bile! İstediğimiz şey bu muydu? Bu işi bitirelim. Döngü'nün süreğini bozalım!" {n}Pirinçfısıltı ismini kullanan şahsın sözleri giderek bir yalvarışa benzemeye başlıyor.{/n}
